cs699_a2021.invertedstack.reviewsx.helpers

Class ReviewsXDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • cs699_a2021.invertedstack.reviewsx.helpers.ReviewsXDatabaseHelper

  • public class ReviewsXDatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    SQLiteDatabase helper for the entire app. This class is responsible for ALL the database operations done by the app.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
        onCreate for the database helper. This method wil create the database file if it doesn't exist, create appropriate tables if they don't exists and also will add the 4 default collections to the DB
        Parameters:
        db -

      • addCollection

        public void addCollection(java.lang.String name)
        Method for adding collection with name `name` to the DB. The caller MUST verify that `name` is NOT a pre-existing collection name
        Parameters:
        name -

      • addCollection

        public void addCollection(SQLiteDatabase db,
                          java.lang.String name)
        Method for adding collection with name `name` to the DB. The caller MUST verify that `name` is NOT a pre-existing collection name. The additional parameter `db` prevents recursive handle generation for the DB
        Parameters:
        db -
        name -

      • deleteCollection

        public void deleteCollection(java.lang.String name)
        Method for deleting collection with name `name` from the DB. The caller MUST verify that collection with name `name` actually exists
        Parameters:
        name -

                             java.lang.String new_name)

        Parameters:

        new_name -

      • updatePaperData

        public boolean updatePaperData(java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String authors,
                               java.lang.String body,
                               java.lang.String conf,
                               java.lang.String year,
                               java.lang.String cat)
        Insert a row into table for papers data
        Parameters:
        id - - ID of the paper
        title - - title of the paper
        authors - - authors of the paper
        body - - more info regarding the paper (one line summary etc. -- whatever came from the server pretty much)
        conf - - conference in which the paper belongs
        year - - year of the conference in which the paper belongs
        cat - - category of the paper in the conference
        Returns:
